original_title: MotoGP: Head to Head - The Great Battles
overview: A look at some of the classic rivalries from motorcycle racing's premier class, MotoGP, including the ongoing battle between Valentino Rossi and Max Biaggi. Also features Schwantz vs Rainey, Doohan vs Criville and Nakano vs Jacque.
title: MotoGP: Head to Head - The Great Battles
